Summary: A white disc shape object caught in the weather web cam.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Boulder Creek
There were no other sightings in Boulder Creek on or around May 22nd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsa white carious disk shape object was in one of the frames of the weather cam when i attempted to monitor local cams for the out of control brush fire in santa cruz mountains today. the resolution is very low on this web cam and i cant make certain what i am looking at. it could be a . itpieace of cloud that just happened to be disc shape. on a very clear day...no clouds in the sky a sudden brush fire grows out of control in santa cruz mountains, about 80 miles south of san francisco. as reported, it started approximately at 5:15 am. in a matter of few hours it engulfed over 2000 acres of the mountain ridges. as an astro-photographer, i often check the weather around for possible observing night. however, with just a couple days past the full moon phase, i was more carious about my friends living locally in santa cruz mountains this time. so i monitored the news channels until afternoon when i left home. later in the afternoon, i started checking local news and online webcams for actually seeing how far the fire had progressed. in one of the captured frames of one particluar web cam i noticed an unusual looking object in the blue and coudless sky. it was white as cloud would be so it could very well be just "cloud". however, being such a perfect disc shape looking, i thought to publicize it, just in case it wasn't some weird looking clouds. in case, others had seen simliar thing. i saved the image from the online site and refreshed the frame. it was not there anymore. unfortunately, i didn't refresh immediately to illuminate the cloud possiblities. i was distracted before i noticed any thing on that frame and it wasn't until about half an hour later that i finally noticed and refreshed to get a new frame. i guess, i would not think of it as a big deal, unless there are other similar local reports. the resolution is very low so it is not very possible to magnify much to see any structures. however, when magnefied, there is a carious shade on just one side (top-left half) which could also be the ccd artifactof the web cam. but, i would expect to see it symetrycally on the opposite side if that was the case. so...it is open for further investigation and possible other sightings...below is the link to the live cam site. http:\\www.heartmath.com\view.html note: the first image with time\date stamp of 16:55 was noticed at about 17:30 (5:30pm). the second image was not the immediate image i saw after this one, but some time later. however, the object was not there after about 30 minutes. i did not save that frame as i didn't think it mattered since it was so much time already passed.
